Borghal

Actually, camelCase vs PascalCase
I see many #FediTips suggesting people use #camelCase in their #Hashtags for #ScreenReader compatibility.But I think they mean #PascalCase. At least, that's what their examples show.For the differences between the two see, for example, here:khalilstemmler.com/blogs/camel
content:
Actually, camelCase vs PascalCase
I see many #FediTips suggesting people use #camelCase in their #Hashtags for #ScreenReader compatibility.But I think they mean #PascalCase. At least, that's what their examples show.For the differences between the two see, for example, here:khalilstemmler.com/blogs/camel

content.html:
Actually, camelCase vs PascalCase

I see many #FediTips suggesting people use #camelCase in their #Hashtags for #ScreenReader compatibility.

But I think they mean #PascalCase. At least, that's what their examples show.

For the differences between the two see, for example, here:

khalilstemmler.com/blogs/camel
